projects.title: Spectral
details: UI Developer Supporting Spectral

projects.title: DSS
details: Majority contributer to DSS User Interface using Angular.
Developed custom visualizations using D3: timelines, maps, other visualizations.
Developed infrastructure to conduct e2e testing using protractor.
Developed state-management paradigm for DSS.
Mentor Developers, and held many Brown Bag lunches on JavaScript/TypesScript related topics.

projects.title: Intern Project
details: Helped interns develop a system to manage HR personnel data with Angular and Java.
Introduced Docker and Containerization to project.
Mentoring interns with Angular Development, and Docker.

projects.title: Hyperledger Topology Visualization
details: Visualized hyper ledger network topology visualization for Silkwave/JICD4.2 Research Project.
This project used blockchain technologies, which was visualized using the VisJS library.

projects.title: Anvil User Interface
details: Developed User Interface for Anvil Team to manage hardware.
Worked directly with customer to gather feedback, and develop software in an iterative manner.

projects.title: Blue Lake
details: Developed a content management system for the ingestion and analysis of collected enemy media.
Worked with other Darpa collaborators to integrate the latest machine learning technologies.
Deployed prototype to Ft. Brag users, gathered feedback and iterated on developing Blue Lake.
Indexed the collected enemy media with elastic search so that they could quickly be triaged and dispositioned.

projects.title: Butler
details: Developed UI for Darpa Butler project to display profiles for dark-web collected entities

title: Senior Software Engineer Subject Matter Expert

projects.title: Acacia
details: Developed Acacia, an audio focused content analytical tool in with NodeJS, Node Native (NAN), and C.
The Acacia pipeline needed to run faster than real-time to be responsive to the user.
Developed C/C++ NAN addons to support hardware USB foot pedal input.
Developed C/C++ NAN addons to perform audio stretch using the soundtouch library.
Developed Node libraries for: adjusting audio gain, interleaving audio files, and generating waveform SVG files.
Integrated Voice Activity Detection, and Voice filtering libraries developed by partner into Acacia

projects.title: Bedrock - DCTC Tasking Team
details: Lead developer for the DCTC Tasking Team which converted the legacy Ruby application into AngularJS.
Developed role-based access control for Tasking application.
Planned spring release schedule, and coordinated team developers.

projects.title: Bedrock
details: Developed the Bedrock advanced search capability with ElasticJS, Angular and Elastic Search.
Developed initialization and error handling framework for the user interface.
Introduced Karma/Jasmine unit testing into Bedrock.

projects.title: Codes, Latch, and GEO Latch
details: Developed user interface for Latch family of multimedia forensic tools.
Developed metadata timelines to visualize data plotted along time
Developed image editing and annotating tool for Latch
Conducted code reviews, developed best user interface best practices and coding standards.
Held brown bag lunches on the topics of JavaScript and Usability.

projects.title: IP Performance Testing Tool
details: Developed platform for testing Customer Premises Equipment and Optical Network Terminals
Tool was instrumental in identifying performance problems with the Verizon network

projects.title: WASP Inventory Management User Interface
details: Developed Verizon laboratory equipment management user interface for WASP software.
